verses.verse: מַשְׂכִּ֗יל <S%H4905><s%> mas-Kil, Maschil לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> le-'A-Saf of Asaph לָמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> la-Mah why אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God זָנַ֣חְתָּ <S%H2186><s%> za-Nach-ta why hast thou cast [us] off לָנֶ֑צַח <S%H5331><s%> la-Ne-tzach; alway יֶעְשַׁ֥ן <S%H6225><s%> ye'-Shan smoke אַ֝פְּךָ֗ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-pe-cha, anger בְּצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> be-Tzon against the sheep מַרְעִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4830><s%> mar-'i-Te-cha. flock

זְכֹ֤ר <S%H2142><s%> ze-Chor Remember עֲדָתְךָ֨׀ <S%H5712><s%> 'a-da-te-Cha thy congregation קָ֘נִ֤יתָ <S%H7069><s%> ka-Ni-ta [which] thou hast purchased קֶּ֗דֶם <S%H6924><s%> Ke-dem, of old גָּ֭אַלְתָּ <S%H1350><s%> Ga-'al-ta [which] thou hast redeemed שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet the rod נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Te-cha; of thine inheritance הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- this mount צִ֝יּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon, Zion זֶ֤ה׀ <S%H2088><s%> zeh this שָׁכַ֬נְתָּ <S%H7931><s%> sha-Chan-ta wherein thou hast dwelt בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

הָרִ֣ימָה <S%H7311><s%> ha-Ri-mah Lift up פְ֭עָמֶיךָ <S%H6471><s%> Fe-'a-mei-cha thy feet לְמַשֻּׁא֣וֹת <S%H4876><s%> le-mash-shu-'ot desolations נֶ֑צַח <S%H5331><s%> Ne-tzach; unto the perpetual כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- everything הֵרַ֖ע <S%H7489><s%> he-Ra' hath done wickedly אוֹיֵ֣ב <S%H341><s%> o-Yev [even] all [that] the enemy בַּקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> bak-Ko-desh. in the sanctuary

שָׁאֲג֣וּ <S%H7580><s%> sha-'a-Gu roar צֹ֭רְרֶיךָ <S%H6887><s%> Tzo-re-rei-cha Thine enemies בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev in the midst מוֹעֲדֶ֑ךָ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'a-De-cha; of thy congregations שָׂ֖מוּ <S%H7760><s%> Sa-mu they set up אוֹתֹתָ֣ם <S%H226><s%> o-to-Tam their ensigns אֹתֽוֹת׃ <S%H226><s%> o-Tot. [for] signs

יִ֭וָּדַע <S%H3045><s%> Yiv-va-da' [A man] was famous כְּמֵבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> ke-me-Vi had lifted לְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> le-Ma-'e-lah; above בִּֽסֲבָךְ־ <S%H5442><s%> bi-sa-voch- upon the thick עֵ֝֗ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'Etz, trees קַרְדֻּמּֽוֹת׃ <S%H7134><s%> kar-dum-Mot. axes

וְעֵת ve-'et כוְ֭עַתָּה Ve-'at-tah קפִּתּוּחֶ֣יהָ <S%H6603><s%> pit-tu-Chei-ha the carved work יָּ֑חַד <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad; thereof at once בְּכַשִּׁ֥יל <S%H3781><s%> be-chash-Shil with axes וְ֝כֵֽילַפֹּ֗ת <S%H3597><s%> ve-chei-lap-Pot, and hammers יַהֲלֹמֽוּן׃ <S%H1986><s%> ya-ha-lo-Mun. But now they break down

שִׁלְח֣וּ <S%H7971><s%> shil-Chu They have cast בָ֭אֵשׁ <S%H784><s%> Va-'esh fire מִקְדָּשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H4720><s%> mik-da-She-cha; into thy sanctuary לָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> la-'A-retz, to the ground חִלְּל֥וּ <S%H2490><s%> chil-le-Lu they have defiled מִֽשְׁכַּן־ <S%H4908><s%> mish-kan- [by casting down] the dwelling place שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha. of thy name

אָמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ru They said בְ֭לִבָּם <S%H3820><s%> Ve-lib-bom in their hearts נִינָ֣ם <S%H3238><s%> ni-Nam Let us destroy יָ֑חַד <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad; them together שָׂרְפ֖וּ <S%H8313><s%> sa-re-Fu they have burned up כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all מוֹעֲדֵי־ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'a-dei- all the synagogues אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> 'el of God בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. in the land

אֽוֹתֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H226><s%> o-to-Tei-nu, not our signs לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor רָ֫אִ֥ינוּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-nu We see אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- There ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od longer נָבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> na-Vi; [there is] no more any prophet וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- Nor אִ֝תָּ֗נוּ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ta-nu, among יֹדֵ֥עַ <S%H3045><s%> yo-De-a' neither [is there] among us any that knoweth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- how long מָֽה׃ <S%H4100><s%> Mah. how

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against מָתַ֣י <S%H4970><s%> ma-Tai How אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God יְחָ֣רֶף <S%H2778><s%> ye-Cha-ref reproach צָ֑ר <S%H6862><s%> Tzar; how long shall the adversary יְנָ֘אֵ֤ץ <S%H5006><s%> ye-Na-'Etz blaspheme אוֹיֵ֖ב <S%H341><s%> o-Yev ;shall the enemy שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha thy name לָנֶֽצַח׃ <S%H5331><s%> la-Ne-tzach. alway

לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why תָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> ta-Shiv Why withdrawest יָ֭דְךָ <S%H3027><s%> Ya-de-cha thou thy hand וִֽימִינֶ֑ךָ <S%H3225><s%> vi-mi-Ne-cha; your right מִקֶּ֖רֶב <S%H7130><s%> mik-Ke-rev [it] out of; חֹוקְךָ chok-cha כחֵֽיקְךָ֣ <S%H2436><s%> chei-ke-Cha bosom קכַלֵּֽה׃ <S%H3615><s%> chal-Leh. destroy

וֵ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> Ve-lo-him For God מַלְכִּ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Ki [is] my King מִקֶּ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> mik-Ke-dem; of old פֹּעֵ֥ל <S%H6466><s%> po-'El working יְ֝שׁוּע֗וֹת <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'ot, salvation בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You פוֹרַ֣רְתָּ <S%H6565><s%> fo-Rar-ta Thou didst divide בְעָזְּךָ֣ <S%H5797><s%> ve-'az-ze-Cha by thy strength יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> Yam; the sea שִׁבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H7665><s%> shib-Bar-ta thou brakest רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei the heads תַ֝נִּינִ֗ים <S%H8577><s%> tan-ni-Nim, of the dragons עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in הַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim. in the waters

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You רִ֭צַּצְתָּ <S%H7533><s%> Ritz-tzatz-ta Thou brakest רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei the heads לִוְיָתָ֑ן <S%H3882><s%> liv-ya-Tan; of leviathan תִּתְּנֶ֥נּוּ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nen-nu in pieces [and] gavest מַ֝אֲכָ֗ל <S%H3978><s%> ma-'a-Chal, him [to be] meat לְעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> le-'Am to the people לְצִיִּֽים׃ <S%H6728><s%> le-tzi-Yim. inhabiting the wilderness

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You בָ֭קַעְתָּ <S%H1234><s%> Va-ka'-ta Thou didst cleave מַעְיָ֣ן <S%H4599><s%> ma'-Yan the fountain וָנָ֑חַל <S%H5158><s%> va-Na-chal; and the flood אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You ה֝וֹבַ֗שְׁתָּ <S%H3001><s%> ho-Vash-ta, thou driedst up נַהֲר֥וֹת <S%H5104><s%> na-ha-Rot rivers אֵיתָֽן׃ <S%H386><s%> 'ei-Tan. mighty

לְךָ֣ le-Cha י֭וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom The day אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- also לְךָ֥ le-Cha לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> La-ye-lah; [is] thine the night אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You הֲ֝כִינ֗וֹתָ <S%H3559><s%> ha-chi-No-ta, also [is] thine thou hast prepared מָא֥וֹר <S%H3974><s%> ma-'or the light וָשָֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> va-Sha-mesh. and the sun

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You הִ֭צַּבְתָּ <S%H5324><s%> Hitz-tzav-ta Thou hast set כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all גְּבוּל֣וֹת <S%H1367><s%> ge-vu-Lot all the borders אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; of the earth קַ֥יִץ <S%H7019><s%> Ka-yitz summer וָ֝חֹ֗רֶף <S%H2779><s%> va-Cho-ref, and winter אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You יְצַרְתָּם׃ <S%H3335><s%> ye-tzar-tam thou hast made

זְכָר־ <S%H2142><s%> ze-chor- Remember זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> Zot, likewise א֭וֹיֵב <S%H341><s%> o-yev this [that] the enemy חֵרֵ֣ף׀ <S%H2778><s%> che-Ref hath reproached יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; O LORD וְעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-'Am people נָ֝בָ֗ל <S%H5036><s%> na-Val, and [that] the foolish נִֽאֲצ֥וּ <S%H5006><s%> ni-'a-Tzu have blasphemed שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha. thy name

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten O deliver לְ֭חַיַּת <S%H2416><s%> Le-chai-yat unto the multitude נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh not the soul תּוֹרֶ֑ךָ <S%H8449><s%> to-Re-cha; of thy turtledove חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat not the congregation עֲ֝נִיֶּ֗יךָ <S%H6041><s%> 'a-ni-Yei-cha, of thy poor אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח <S%H7911><s%> tish-Kach [of the wicked] forget לָנֶֽצַח׃ <S%H5331><s%> la-Ne-tzach. for ever

הַבֵּ֥ט <S%H5027><s%> hab-Bet Have respect לַבְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> lab-be-Rit; unto the covenant כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מָלְא֥וּ <S%H4390><s%> mal-'U are full מַחֲשַׁכֵּי־ <S%H4285><s%> ma-cha-shak-kei- for the dark אֶ֝֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz, places of the earth נְא֣וֹת <S%H4999><s%> ne-'ot of the habitations חָמָֽס׃ <S%H2555><s%> cha-Mas. of cruelty

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay יָשֹׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Sho return דַּ֣ךְ <S%H1790><s%> dach O let not the oppressed נִכְלָ֑ם <S%H3637><s%> nich-Lam; ashamed עָנִ֥י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-Ni let the poor וְ֝אֶבְי֗וֹן <S%H34><s%> ve-'ev-Yon, and needy יְֽהַלְל֥וּ <S%H1984><s%> ye-hal-Lu praise שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha. thy name

קוּמָ֣ה <S%H6965><s%> ku-Mah Arise אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God רִיבָ֣ה <S%H7378><s%> ri-Vah plead רִיבֶ֑ךָ <S%H7379><s%> ri-Ve-cha; thine own cause זְכֹ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> ze-Chor remember חֶרְפָּתְךָ֥ <S%H2781><s%> cher-pa-te-Cha reproacheth מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> min-ni- at נָ֝בָ֗ל <S%H5036><s%> na-Val, how the foolish man כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. thee daily

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּ֭שְׁכַּח <S%H7911><s%> Tish-kach Forget ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol not the voice צֹרְרֶ֑יךָ <S%H6887><s%> tzo-re-Rei-cha; of thine enemies שְׁא֥וֹן <S%H7588><s%> she-'on the tumult קָ֝מֶ֗יךָ <S%H6965><s%> ka-Mei-cha, of those that rise up עֹלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> 'o-Leh against thee increaseth תָמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid. continually
